comment: There are A TON of assignments in this class! She is a very caring professor but she mainly had guest speakers come to the class (they were really interesting speakers). Most of the material had to be learned outside of the classroom, but Professor Encisco would take time out of her day (and weekend) to help her students.

Wish I took this class online because that's what it was like. Class time was filled with guest speakers 98% of the time. Interesting lectures, but barely had anything to do with the course itself. Didn't learn anything other than a little bit of excel. If you want an easy A, take her. If you want to learn IS, take someone else.

Such an awesome class. I took IS online last semester and actually withdrew, but this time I had a great experience, and actually learned a lot of things in word, powerpoint, excel, that I used and will use in my other classes. In class notes/presentations, random attendance points, open note/book midterm final. Definitely recommend!

Pretty easy class. Dr. Encisco is a very nice professor and will give great feedback on all assignments. There are discussion posts, quizzes, 2 tests (that arent weighted too heavily), and projects (including a group one). Not a lecture-heavy class so more often than not there will be guest speakers.
rating_tags: GROUP PROJECTS--Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Professor is extremely unorganized, lazy, and not knowledgeable on what she should be teaching us. So if you want to learn something do not take her, but if you want an A and thats it she will do. Quizzes and tests online, as well as a lot of busy work. Class is not worth going to and book is not required.

Easy A, just do your online quizzes and work and you'll be fine trust me, I'm as lazy as they come and not the smartest but just make a groupme for your class and you'll be straight. esp. for 8pm class.

Super sweet professor that gives good feedback in a good time frame. Definitely take her!!! Attendance isnt mandatory but it helps with the material. You dont need the textbook at all. I used it for the first few assignments but stopped and still passed with an A.

Very sweet professor. She gives great feedback on assignments, and will also help you with work you just have to ask. Attendance is not necessary, but she helps you a lot during lectures with assignments. Mixed it up with guest speakers which was very awesome!

" She is an extremely sweet, helpful, caring lady. There is one group project at the end of the semester, weekly online quizzes, a few assignments (excel, word, ppt), and a few discussion boards. Attendance is not mandatory. Online book/access code required ($140). TAKE HER!" I copied this but I couldn't agree more! She is an amazing teacher!

This was professor Encisco's first year of teaching. She is an extremely sweet, helpful, caring lady. There is one group project at the end of the semester, weekly online quizzes, a few assignments (excel, word, ppt), and a few discussion boards. Attendance is not mandatory. Online book/access code required ($140). TAKE HER!
